section_title: WORKSHOP ON ADJUSTMENTS UNDER PROTOCOL ARTICLE 5.2
sentences: This workshop took place from 7-9 April 2003, in Lisbon, Portugal, and assessed case studies undertaken by the UNFCCC Secretariat for simulating the calculation of adjustments under Article 5.2.
The outcome was refined draft technical guidance on methodologies for adjustments under Article 5.2.
SBSTA-18 is expected to complete the technical guidance.
